thread.section_title: Property Matrix Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Property Matrix | propertymatrix.com
thread.title: Lori Sampson
thread.title_full: Property Matrix reviewed by Lori Sampson

author: Lori Sampson
title: Lori Sampson
text: I have been a member since the year started. I really like the fact that someone is there to correct anything that I need in timely manner. They respond very quickly. I also like that its always the same person. Im still learning, but its not that hard. Everything is very accurate and easy to learn. I think we will be members long term. Property Matrix gives all types of documents which come in handy when needed. My favorite part is, how fast their response is when I need help. AWESOME!
